long_description: A travel-smart blend of soft cotton and quick-dry nylon, the stretchy Kuhl Kendra Capri Pants for women take you from European hill towns to tropical beach towns in comfort. Bi-component fabric blends a smooth nylon layer next to the skin and a soft cotton outer layer that work together to pull moisture away from your skin, dry quickly and breathe. A touch of spandex addes stretch for comfort and freedom of movement. Kuhl Kendra capri pants feature a curved back waistband and internal drawcord for a flattering fit. Also includes hand pockets, 2 back patch pockets and the signature Kuhl snap. Floral embroidery at back yoke. Easy care wash and wear.
short_description: A travel-smart blend of soft cotton and quick-dry nylon, the stretchy Kuhl Kendra Capri Pants for women take you from European hill towns to tropical beach towns in comfort.
